tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteManagementFacilities (
   facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   facility_name VARCHAR(255),
   location VARCHAR(255),
   capacity INT,
   utilization INT,
   last_update DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FacilityReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  waste_type STRING,
  total_waste_generated DECIMAL,
  total_waste_collected DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementFacilities(facility_id)
);
CREATE TABLE WasteFacility (facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY, facility_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, capacity INT NOT NULL, utilization FLOAT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE WasteBin (bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY, bin_type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, capacity INT NOT NULL, current_level INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE CollectionSchedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, facility_id INT NOT NULL, bin_id INT NOT NULL, collection_day VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, collection_time TIME NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementFacilities (
	facility_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	facility_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	utilization DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CollectionReports (
	report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	facility_id UUID REFERENCES WasteManagementFacilities(facility_id),
	collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
	collected_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE UtilizationReports (
	report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	facility_id UUID REFERENCES WasteManagementFacilities(facility_id),
	report_date DATE NOT NULL,
	utilization_percentage DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE DashboardUsers (
	user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE waste_facility (
   facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   facility_name VARCHAR(50),
   location VARCHAR(100),
   capacity INT,
   utilization FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_bin (
   bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   facility_id INT REFERENCES waste_facility(facility_id),
   bin_type VARCHAR(50),
   capacity INT,
   utilization FLOAT
);
